title: I just watched a guy eat watermelon

embed.description: http://www.cdbaby.com/cd/tomwillett My CDBaby songs for downloading... Really. http://www.myhollywoodstar.com/ My Bio Site http://www.ezpianochords.com. My piano lessons http://www.comedyparade.com/ One of my sites http://www.facebook.com/TheWatermelonCult I am way behind on answering comments. I have many hundreds of e-mails to get to so it will take awhile. Thanks. This is a beginner's tutorial showing the correct way to eat a watermelon.

body: Where did I go wrong in life...
